languages.text: {n}Разъяренный гвалт, в мгновение заполнивший мостик, прорезает старческий шепот:{/n} "Довольно, дочь".
languages.translation_comment:
Висирь — камера
выход на катсцену с Висирем

Висирь — камера
выход на катсцену с Висирем

languages.text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
languages.original_text: {n}Разъяренный гвалт, в мгновение заполнивший мостик, прорезает старческий шепот:{/n} "Довольно, дочь".

traits.locale_text: {n}In an instant, the bridge is filled with furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
{n}In an instant, the bridge is filled with furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
{n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
{n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
{n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
{n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."

languages.text: {n}La passerelle résonne soudainement d'une clameur frénétique.{/n} « Assez, ma fille, » {n}murmure un vieil homme, mettant immédiatement fin au tumulte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."

traits.locale_text: {n}La passerelle résonne soudainement d'une clameur frénétique.{/n} « Assez, ma fille, » {n}murmure un vieil homme, mettant immédiatement fin au tumulte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El puente se llena de un clamor espantoso hasta que el susurro de un anciano atraviesa el ruido.{/n} «Basta, hija mía».
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."

traits.locale_text: {n}El puente se llena de un clamor espantoso hasta que el susurro de un anciano atraviesa el ruido.{/n} «Basta, hija mía».

languages.text: {n}ブリッジはあっという間に激しい喧騒に包まれたが、老人の囁きがその雑音を切り裂いた。{/n}「もうやめろ、我が娘よ」
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジはあっという間に激しい喧騒に包まれたが、老人の囁きがその雑音を切り裂いた。{/n}「もうやめろ、我が娘よ」

languages.text: {n}一瞬间，舰桥上充满了暴怒的咆哮声，但某个老人的耳语声盖过了所有的喧嚣。{/n}“够了，我的女儿。”
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬间，舰桥上充满了暴怒的咆哮声，但某个老人的耳语声盖过了所有的喧嚣。{/n}“够了，我的女儿。”

languages.text: {n}Die Brücke ist plötzlich erfüllt von einem wilden Lärm, bis das Flüstern eines alten Mannes den Krach durchdringt.{/n} "Genug, meine Tochter!"
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Brücke ist plötzlich erfüllt von einem wilden Lärm, bis das Flüstern eines alten Mannes den Krach durchdringt.{/n} "Genug, meine Tochter!"

languages.text: {n}Köprüyü bir anda öfkeli bir feryat dolduruyor.{/n} Ardından ihtiyar bir adamın fısıltısı, gürültüyü yarıda kesiyor. "Bu kadar yeter kızım."
languages.original_text: {n}The bridge is suddenly filled with a furious clamour, until an old man's whisper cuts through the noise.{/n} "Enough, my daughter."
